title: Ammo Box
summaries: The Ammo Box is a furniture item. It can be purchased (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) from the Arms Dealer for 10 GC in Hardmode, or (Old-gen console version) from the Traveling Merchant for 15 GC at any time.

Placing and pressing ⚷ Open / Activate on the Ammo Box grants the Ammo Box buff, which provides ranged weapons with a 1/5 (20%) chance per shot not to consume ammunition. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, this lasts until the player dies or leaves the world. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, it lasts for 10 minutes. On all versions, the buff can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]).

Unlike <linked>equipment buff items</linked>, the Ammo Box must be placed in order to activate the buff. It can be mined with a <linked>pickaxe</linked> or <linked>drill</linked> and picked up again, even while the buff is active, which will not cancel the buff. Placement is only dependent on an adequate space of 2×2 tiles being available.

statistics.Buy: 10 GC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 15 GC (Old-gen console version)
statistics.Sell: 2 GC (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 3 GC (Old-gen console version)
